marklogic.body: The U.S. Supreme Court needs to here argument on the Obama qualification issue, make a ruling once and for all, and put all this behind us. IF it is found that the "Natural Born Citizen" means being the offspring of two parents that are citizens then of course Obama cannot cut the mustard, and should definitely be Ousted. IF he attempts to rally his personal civilian army behind him and declare Martial Law, then our Chief Military General (or whatever he is called) should pull a military coup and arrest him on the Spot, and immediately dissolve Obama's civilian army by any and all means necessary to accomplish the job.
